arts.ttl: Chelsea vs Brighton team news LIVE!
arts.sum: Chelsea head coach Enzo Maresca has confirmed that Cole Palmer will undergo a period of rest to fix an ongoing groin issue. Palmer, who was withdrawn after 21 minutes at Man Utd last weekend, is likely to be missing until after the next international break.

arts.ttl: Hurzeler hands out team news for Brighton’s trip to Chelsea
arts.sum: “[He] can play everywhere because he has like this this ability that he's good in every position. He got or received a hit so therefore he needed a lot of treatment but he trained so he will be fine.”

arts.ttl: Levi Colwill and Behdad Eghbali spotted with former Chelsea target hours before Brighton clash
arts.sum: Chelsea defender Levi Colwill has been spotted back on his feet after he was forced to undergo surgery on an anterior cruciate ligament injury that he suffered in pre-season

arts.ttl: Brighton XI vs Chelsea – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Brighton & Hove Albion travel to Stamford Bridge on Saturday with their confidence restored after a stunning 6-0 Carabao Cup victory in midweek. That result was a welcome boost for Fabian Hurzeler’s side, who have struggled for consistency in the Premier League this season and currently sit 14th in the table.
